page.title: 11CHESTERTON'S SUPERMARKET
page.content: Gateway's Supermarket,a converted warehouse,is on the edge of the industrial estate.A building of 30,000 m2 floor area,of this 20,000m2 is shopping area.Most customers,10,000 per week,arrive by car.There is a petrol station and free carpark.Local factory workers buy lunch snacks but most shopprs buy in bulk.Of weekly food sales,5% is meat,5% vegetables, 10% wines & spirits.These double at Christmas time.The store also sells clothing and household goods.Ordering is computerised.There are 39 full time staff,20 part time & 12 teenagers who, still at school,work on Saturdays. There are 7 cleaners & staff for a franchise cafe on the site.Trade improves at the end of each month as people spend their pay cheques on food for their freezers.
